Domain.title: Enhancing Social Media Privacy Settings
Domain.quickWin: Set profiles to friends-only; disable location and public tagging.
Domain.factor: Open profiles, tagging, and location visibility increase exposure.

Domain.title: Phishing Awareness and Email Security
Domain.quickWin: Never click from messages—use saved bookmarks or official apps.
Domain.factor: Unsolicited emails/DMs with links/attachments raise risk.

Domain.title: Privacy Settings on Popular Apps
Domain.quickWin: Revoke unnecessary camera/mic/location; hide lock-screen previews.
Domain.factor: Loose app permissions leak sensitive data.

Domain.title: Detecting Spyware Infections on Devices
Domain.quickWin: Audit device-admin apps; run reputable scans; update OS.
Domain.factor: Overheating/drain with unknown admin apps suggests spyware.

Domain.title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup and Management
Domain.quickWin: Enable an authenticator app and store backup codes safely.

Domain.title: Password Management and Security
Domain.quickWin: Turn on a password manager; rotate any reused passwords.
Domain.factor: Reused or weak passwords propagate compromise.

Domain.title: Managing Your Digital Footprint
Domain.quickWin: Quarterly cleanup: prune old posts; remove data-broker listings.
Domain.factor: Large, stable footprints make targeting easier.

Domain.title: Recognizing AI-Assisted Manipulation and Deepfakes
Domain.quickWin: Reverse-image key frames; check lip-sync and metadata before sharing.
Domain.factor: Exposure to AI personas/media increases manipulation risk.

Domain.title: Using VPNs for Secure Browsing
Domain.quickWin: Use a trusted VPN on public or school networks.
Domain.factor: Unencrypted sessions disclose activity and location.

Domain.title: Safe Use of Public Computers and Wi-Fi
Domain.quickWin: Avoid sensitive logins; if needed use private windows and sign out.
Domain.factor: Shared machines and open Wi-Fi leak credentials/data.

Domain.title: Identifying Hidden Surveillance Devices (Electronic Scanning)
Domain.quickWin: Do visual/RF/network sweeps when in new spaces.
Domain.factor: Never scanning leaves covert cams/mics undiscovered.

Domain.title: Safe Online Banking Practices
Domain.quickWin: Use official apps; enable alerts; review statements weekly.
Domain.factor: Link-driven logins and poor monitoring risk fraud.

Domain.title: Recognizing Malicious Mobile Apps
Domain.quickWin: Install from official stores; review permissions and dev history.
Domain.factor: Sideloading/rare updates increase malicious app risk.

Domain.title: Verifying Online Identities and Combating Catfishing
Domain.quickWin: Reverse-image search and cross-check handles before engaging.
Domain.factor: Accepting unknowns without checks invites scams/abuse.

Domain.title: Securing Home Wi-Fi Networks
Domain.quickWin: Change admin creds; use WPA3; enable a separate guest network.
Domain.factor: Defaults and shared main credentials expose the home network.
